parameters.query:
SELECT 
  url_checked,
  response_time,
  is_available,
  fetch_timestamp
FROM marketing_ops.website_content_monitor 
WHERE fetch_timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours'
ORDER BY fetch_timestamp DESC

parameters.command: tail -n 100 /var/log/nginx/access.log | grep -E '(404|500|502|503)' | wc -l && tail -n 100 /var/log/nginx/access.log | grep -E '(POST|PUT|DELETE)' | head -10

parameters.columns: check_timestamp, total_issues, critical_issues, system_health_score, performance_issues, security_alerts, system_alerts
